extendedInfo.description: **ON SALE NOW!! .99 For A Limited Time Only!!***Hurry!! .99 Sale ends soon!!Jewel Spinner - a fast paced matching game that leaves you wanting more. This skill based game will test the very limits of your reflexes as you match like colored jewels fast enough to survive each level. Great multiple match bonuses and only the best of players can clear the board. If you're tired of other match games putting you to sleep, Jewel Spinner will fill you with adrenaline and excitement as you progress through the levels. With a spinning center piece, you match the attached jewel to the correlating jewel by tapping on the appropriate slider. If your quick enough you can clear the board of all jewels and receive a large bonus and by matching sequences of like colored jewels. Using the joker gem you can also rack up the points and compete for the high score.Featuresâ¢	20 levels slowly building to the ultimate challenge.â¢	3 levels of difficulty.â¢	Saved top scores.â¢	Cool sound and special effects.â¢	Online demo video.â¢	Continue previous game.
